item.description:
I like this weekly walk Al, am posting it in case you forgot to.... Christine & Hugo

Meet us at 7pm at the ice arena at parks and rec on Electric st. Manchester.

Probably start on leash for a bit and see how the dogs are doing, then maybe take 'em off on the way back if they're good.

See you then!
-Al

PS. Directions.
Take exit 6, bearing to the right (if from the North) or left(if from the South) once you exit the highway. This will take you to a rotary. Stay on the rotary passing through one set of lights. After this set of lights, stay in the middle of the rotary and continue until a second set of lights. At this set of lights, you will continue straight through them which will bring you off the rotary. Take a left onto Montgomery street, then a right onto Bremer St. Take Bremer @ 1 mile then a left onto Electric Street. Ice Arena will be right ahead of you.
http://maps.google.co...

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Manchester Ice Arena bike trail walk.
